official-title.#text:
To amend chapters 83 and 84 of title 5, United States
		  Code, to provide for the indexation of deferred annuities; to provide that a
		  survivor annuity be provided to the widow or widower of a former employee who
		  dies after separating from Government service with title to a deferred annuity
		  under the Civil Service Retirement System but before establishing a valid claim
		  therefor, and for other purposes.
